name: Bee Nice
description:
A game for Global startup Cities Game Jam, made in two days.

Instructions

Extract the game, run BeeNice.exe in the extracted folder. 

But first get your Twitch OAuth token at https://twitchapps.com/tmi/, fill in username, channel name and OAuth token.

Then start a stream and invite some friends, have them type something in the chat to get more bees! You don't have to set up a stream though, if you just want to test it out you can just have some people write in the chat. There will also always be one default bee if your friends can't make it. 

Rebuild the world together!

#StartupCitiesGameJam

We have uploaded a new .zip file at 19:10, the one from 18:50 was not able to connect to Twitch. Should be working now. *fingerscrossed*
